de: Privater Pflegeparcours im Schwimmbad, in der Sauna und im Hammam, bevor es in die Pflegekabine geht (Gesicht und Körper: Cinq Mondes); zum Abschluss eine Entspannungspause im Garten oder im Entspannungsraum.
en:
The Domaine de la Pommeraye is located in the heart of Normandy, not far from the towns of Caen, Bayeux, Vire, Flers, Argentan and Falaise.

This totally refurbished former 18th century stud farm welcomes you to satisfy your reception, conference...
it: Trattamenti privati in piscina, sauna e hammam prima di passare alle sale per i trattamenti (viso e corpo: Cinq Mondes); per finire con una pausa relax in giardino o nella sala relax.
fr: Parcours de soins privatifs en piscine, sauna et hammam avant de passer en cabine de soins (visage et corps : cinq Mondes) ; pour terminer par une pause relaxation au jardin ou en salle de relaxation.
es: Tratamientos privados en la piscina, la sauna y el hammam antes de pasar a las salas de tratamiento (facial y corporal: Cinq Mondes); para terminar con una pausa de relajación en el jardín o en la sala de descanso.
nl: Privébehandelingen in het zwembad, de sauna en de hammam alvorens over te gaan naar de behandelingsruimten (gezicht en lichaam: Cinq Mondes); om te eindigen met een ontspanningspauze in de tuin of in de ontspanningsruimte.

en: Spa du Domaine de la Pommeraye
fr: Spa du Domaine de la Pommeraye

de: Privater Pflegeparcours im Schwimmbad, in der Sauna und im Hammam, bevor es in die Pflegekabine geht (Gesicht und Körper: Cinq Mondes); zum Abschluss eine Entspannungspause im Garten oder im Entspannungsraum.
en:
The Domaine de la Pommeraye is located in the heart of Normandy, not far from the towns of Caen, Bayeux, Vire, Flers, Argentan and Falaise.

This totally refurbished former 18th century stud farm welcomes you to satisfy your reception, conference and well-being needs.

Over a body care option, a massage from across the globe - Thaï oil, shiatsu, siro abhyanga, or Balinese… indulge yourself within our hotel and spa.

For a half day, a full day or a longer break in our hotel and spa and its atypical decor, in a medley of old stone and wooden beams, come and make the most of our hammam, sauna, heated pool (30°C) and relaxation area, over a wellness break in the heart of Normandy.

The Domaine de la Pommeraye is the ideal place to unwind and recharge your batteries. This improbably stylish destination, in the midst of nature’s best, offers spacious yet cosy guest rooms, combined with the best in spa care, to ensure you a charmingly authentic relaxation break.

For you, for him, for her… with friends or loved one, a moment at the Domaine de la Pommeraye Spa is also the perfect gift idea.

For your private or professional events, your reception or wedding in Normandy, a birthday, christening or business meeting, the Domaine de la Pommeraye also boasts two fine banqueting or meeting rooms.

To top it all, the Domaine offers relaxing accommodation in its guest room, complemented by table d’hôte dinners.
